name: Nizar Qabbani
description: Syrian diplomat and poet, known as Syria's National Poet, revolutionized Arabic poetry with his romantic and political verses celebrating women and Arab identity
philosophy: I am with the Arabs... even when they are wrong. For nothing is more important than being wrong together, than being right alone.
quotes: The woman in my country wears the desert like a mask
I love you when you bow in your mosque, kneel in your temple, pray in your church
